title: Context Test: Base Task
description: Create a base module that will be referenced by another task
instruction:
Create a Python module with the following:

1. Create a file called calculator.py with basic math operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
2. Each function should have proper documentation
3. Include error handling for division by zero
4. Create a simple test file test_calculator.py with at least 2 tests

This is a base task whose output will be used by test-context-dependent.
